title.rendered: 135 Best Free Bootstrap Templates for Modern Websites 2020

Here you will find all the best Bootstrap templates for any type of website from a simple blog to e-commerce and directories.

Bootstrap has taken over the world and we have taken over the template market with these free Bootstrap templates! Made and supported by Colorlib these Bootstrap templates have everything you will need and they are all free to use.

Bootstrap is the most preferred front end web development tool. It is widely used by all web developers and even by the leading web development company. Bootstrap was born in the Twitter laboratory even it is known as the Twitter blueprint in its early stage. Due to flexibility developers started using it for their web development, now Bootstrap has become one of the primary qualifications for any website template.

Bootstrap’s primary aim is to connect designers with developers. It brings many dream website to the real world. The main advantages of using the Bootstrap framework are responsiveness, easy to customize and consistency in design. Bootstrap website templates help you to create mobile responsive websites easily without disturbing the core design aesthetics of the website template. Bootstrap releases updated periodically to meet the modern world needs. Here we have mentioned some of the best free Bootstrap templates that you can use for your site.
